name: Russia Vs Poland
description:
I made this back in high school in gamemaker 8, so don't be too rough on it.

Player 1 uses WASD, F, G, and H, while player 2 uses the arrow keys and 1, 2, and 3 on the numpad. Try fiddling with the num lock if it doesn't work. 

RussiaVPoland, the second file (in the zip) is made in gamemaker studio 2, and is much newer and is also unfinished. It uses f and g (and 1 and 2) to scroll through selections and J and 3 to place. It's less polished, and probably will never be finished.
